alert.note: Alert for Cochise (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 07 at 1:25PM MST until August 07 at 2:15PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tucson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Cochise County in southeastern Arizona... * Until 215 PM MST. * At 125 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Portal, or 7 miles west of Rodeo, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts, quarter size hail and brief heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Portal and Paradise. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
